short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your day with Quotez, a Chrome extension that delivers motivational quotes in every new tab to inspire and enlighten you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quotez is a Chrome extension designed for those seeking inspiration and motivation right at their fingertips. It transforms the simple act of opening a new tab into an opportunity to discover wisdom, creativity, and insight. Drawing from a diverse library of books across genres and time periods, Quotez presents you with a carefully selected quote to brighten your day, challenge your perspectives, or provide solace in moments of need.

In today's fast-paced world, finding moments for reflection and personal growth can be a challenge. Quotez makes it effortless by seamlessly integrating into your daily digital routine. Each time you open a new tab, it's a chance to pause and reflect, even if just for a moment. The quotes span a range of themes, including personal development, happiness, success, love, resilience, and much more, ensuring that every new tab brings you something relevant and enriching.

To make your experience even more personal, Quotez now allows you to like or dislike quotes. This new feature gives you control over which quotes will or will not be displayed to you in the future. By liking a quote, you indicate that you want to see more of this type of content, while disliking a quote ensures that similar quotes are less likely to appear. In this way, Quotez learns your preferences over time and tailors the displayed quotes to become even more relevant and inspiring for your personal journey.
